Itachi uses his [[Mangekyō Sharingan]] on the opponent to trap them inside the [[Tsukuyomi]], then comes walking up behind the opponent and stabs them in the back. Left open to attack, Kisame comes up from the water below to finish the foe with a slash from his [[Samehada]].

{{DEFAULTSORT:Mangekyo Shark Sword}}
